sentences.en: A number of metals and alloys, how ever , are difficult to silver - solder and require special procedures.
sentences.cn: 但是有许多金属和合金是难于银焊的,因此需要采用专门的工艺方法.

sentences.en: An ideal connection that puts any solder to shame.
sentences.cn: 这种理想的连结方式,让其它各类接合方式瞠乎其后.

sentences.en: And techniques to make free solder bumping with electroplating are illustrated.
sentences.cn: 重点阐述了采用电镀制作无铅焊料凸点的方法.

sentences.en: Application: Apply to all kinds of solder wire with lead or lead - free.
sentences.cn: 适用产品类型: 适用于各种含铅及无铅焊锡丝的拉伸.

sentences.en: Do the supplies use magnifying glass to full check PCB solder connections?
sentences.cn: 供应商是否用放大镜全面检查PCB的焊点?

sentences.en: Each sculptural planter is made-to-order with handmade glass and lead-free solder and comes with everything you need but the plants.
sentences.cn: 每个艺术花盆都是定制的。 它们由手工制作的玻璃和无铅焊料接合而成，交付使用时，万事俱备，只欠花卉。

sentences.en: Fewer workers are needed to solder circuit boards.
sentences.cn: 焊接电路板需要的工人更少了。

sentences.en: If copper is used, it is okay to solder.
sentences.cn: 如果铜被用, 它对焊接剂是好.

sentences.en: Joints between reinforcement members can be made satisfactorily with tin solder.
sentences.cn: 锡焊能够满意地做成加筋构件之间的接头.

sentences.en: Rear - mounted designs are available with either solder cups or PCB solder pins.
sentences.cn: 后端安装设计可以使用防尘套或者PCB焊接钉.

sentences.en: Safe and reliable, by the automatic flash welding solder welding, welding uniform.
sentences.cn: 安全可靠, 经全自动闪光焊阻焊焊接, 焊接均匀一致.

sentences.en: Solder Mask or Solder resist: Coating to prevent solder to deposit on.
sentences.cn: 阻焊膜(或阻焊剂): 防止焊料上焊的涂层.

sentences.en: Specific modular units including tin - lead solder being used in special professional equipment.
sentences.cn: 特殊专业设备中包含铅锡焊料的特定组合单元.

sentences.en: Then, he adds every iron shoe solder goes to 30 kilograms.
sentences.cn: 于是, 他把每只铁鞋加焊到30公斤.

sentences.en: This superior reliability comes from advances in packaging techniques and epitaxial structure, together with the use of hard solder construction.
sentences.cn: 这种超级可靠性来自于封装技术和外延结构的发展，也得益于硬焊接架构的使用。

sentences.en: Use only with production equipment specifically designed for use with solder paste.
sentences.cn: 于专为锡膏设计的设备中使用.

sentences.en: Used with the solder wire together, soldering a stainless steel etc metal.
sentences.cn: 同锡线一起使用, 焊接不锈钢等难以上锡的金属.

sentences.en: You can either solder them together properly with a metal strip on the front, or just try positioning the metal correctly inside the case with the cells.
sentences.cn: 你可以使用前面的金属条将他们焊在一起，或者只是定位好电池盒里面的电池单元的金属条。

words.tran_cn: 焊接；使联合；修补（solder的ing形式）

phrases.tran_cn: 焊锡；锡焊条，锡焊料；软焊料

trans.tran_en: a soft metal, usually a mixture of  lead  and  tin  , which can be melted and used to join two metal surfaces, wires etc

trans.tran_cn: 焊接， 焊在一起， 焊合
trans.tran_en: to join or repair metal surfaces with solder
to join or repair metal surfaces with solder
